item.description:
Hi,

We are planning to have another co-event with the Australian Meet-up group here in Boston and we will be checking out the Museum of Fine Arts First Friday event. Here is a short description of the event.

There is no other way to start the month! Please join us in the Koch Gallery to socialize with friends and meet new ones. Offering sensational cocktails, a delicious tapas menu, fine art, a glorious Museum setting, and live music, mfafirstfridays kicks off the month in style.

We will be meeting at the event anytime after 6:30 PM.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian April Meet-up - MFA First Fridays
